channel.title: Data Science / Programming Portfolio on Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science / Programming Portfolio on Home Page

item.title: Project I: Face recognition using convolutional neural networks
item.description: The lastest version of the project was uploaded directly to my GitHub Repository. Here you can find only outline of the work. Please look at the GitHub README file to see very detailed documentation describing the model building process! Repo includes Python code for models building, processing steps like a try to understand the whole dataset, image preprocessing and data normalization. Project scope: Introduction Why convolutional neural network?

item.title: Project II: Web Scraping using Python
item.description: The lastest version of the project was uploaded directly to my GitHub Repository. Here you can find only outline of the work. Please look at the GitHub README file to see very detailed documentation describing how the program works! Repo includes final source code and two Excels with analysis results. Each of them provides real data concerning laptop names and their prices - attributes extracted directly from the Web. Project scope:

item.title: Project III: R Shiny Web Application
item.description: The lastest version of the project was uploaded directly to my GitHub Repository. Here you can find only outline of the work. Please look at the GitHub README file to see very detailed documentation describing how the app works! Repo includes final source code and one Excel file called “Covid.csv” with source data which is necessary to perform analysis on the server side of application. Project scope: Introduction What is Shiny application?

item.title: Project IV: Programming Portfolio Website
item.description: The lastest version of the project was uploaded directly to my GitHub Repository. Here you can find only outline of the work. Please look at the GitHub README file to see very detailed documentation describing how the website is built and deployed! Repo includes final rendered HTML files, images and tags needed to build the site. Project scope: Introduction What is Hugo framework? Technology Stack How the site is built and published?

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Maciej Pyra - Data Scientist and Python Developer who is passionate for exploring relationships between variables and recognition of hidden data patterns. My interest in cutting edge tools and technologies allows me to combine my career path with my hobbies. I really enjoy programming in Python the most - this language together with SQL (databases integration) was and is still used most often in my business projects, but I am open to other programming languages, predominantly R and Julia.
